sentences.en: An alternative to monetary damages is an injunction prohibiting publication of the allegedly libelous material.
sentences.cn: 除经济赔偿之外的另一种做法是颁布禁令，禁止发表被指称诽谤的材料。

sentences.en: Here, the truer the scandal, the more libelous it is.
sentences.cn: 在这儿, 丑事愈真实,诽谤的罪就愈大.

sentences.en: No evidence has been found in the case so far and therefore it is probably a libelous suit.
The book was libelous, so the publishers had to call in all copies of it from the bookshops.
sentences.cn: 这是一本诽谤性的书, 所以出版商必须把店里的书全收回去.

sentences.en: The chain says it has found upwards of 4,000 messages online containing libelous claims—including photos!
sentences.cn: 链说它发现了4000以上的网上留言含有诽谤索赔包括照片！

sentences.en: This borderline-libelous MTV advert produced for World Aids Day highlights how your partner's past conquests may come back to haunt them, and you.
sentences.cn: 这则疑似诽谤的MTV广告为世界艾滋病日而作。 它强调了你以往的交往对象们也许会困扰你们。

words.tran_cn: 诽谤的；损害名誉的；用言语中伤他人的

trans.tran_cn: 诽谤的，含有诽谤文字的，爱诽谤的
